member.name: DXGI_RESIDENCY
member.summary: Flags indicating the memory location of a resource.

member.name: DXGI_RESIDENCY.DXGI_RESIDENCY_FULLY_RESIDENT
member.summary: The resource is located in video memory.

member.name: DXGI_RESIDENCY.DXGI_RESIDENCY_RESIDENT_IN_SHARED_MEMORY
member.summary: At least some of the resource is located in CPU memory.

member.name: DXGI_RESIDENCY.DXGI_RESIDENCY_EVICTED_TO_DISK
member.summary: At least some of the resource has been paged out to the hard drive.
